item.title: Mifid
item.description: FX Spot is not covered by the regulation, as it is not considered to be a financial instrument by ESMA, the European Union (EU) regulator. As FX is considered “illiquid” it does not have pre-trade reporting requirements. Recordkeeping – MiFID II requires firms to keep extensive records of all transactions, communications, services and activities for 10 years, in order for them to be able to provide transparency into the trade life cycle.
